body.name: Baby Stroller 2 in 1 Newborn Convertible Stroller Bassinet for Infant New Born Pushchair 0-36 Month
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 19 hrs 53 mins
features: ❤ Stylish & Durable Luxury Stroller: Accombe infant stroller boasts a sturdy alloy frame for sturdy & comfortable walks and breathable, skin-friendly fabric that won't irritate your baby's delicate skin. It also comes with a detachable foot cover to keep your little one warm and a convenient mommy bag for holding essentials.

❤ 2 in 1 Convertible Stroller: This baby stroller is not only a standard stroller, but also a moving baby bassinet.Backrest and footrest adjusted easily converts from seat to a bassinet offering your newborn a comfortable reclining or sleeping position. Plus, you can detach and reverse the bassinet to let your toddler face forward or towards you while you stroll.

❤ All Terrain Carriage Stroller: With big size PU wheels and shock-absorbing springs on the rear wheels, this all-terrain carriage stroller effectively reduces bumps during travel, keeping your baby comfortable and safe. It also features a 5-point safety belt/one foot brake/detachable armrest and wristband for added security.

❤ Multiple Adjustable Bassinet Stroller: The bassinet stroller offers multiple adjustable features, including a canopy that can be adjusted freely to protect your baby from harmful ultraviolet radiation; handlebar adjusted in multiple levels to fit parents in different heights. It also features ventilated net and skylight window to allow air flow and provide a full view of your child.

❤ Large Storage Space & Compact Fold: Newborn stroller features a storage bag behind the bassinet back and a storage basket underneath for holding babies diaper and parents essentials. With compact fold design, can be stored in the corner or taken with you on your travels. It's a stroller can be used for baby from newborn to toddler.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Quality Frame the frame of the stroller is made of high-strength alloy and plastic, which ensures smooth and safety when strolling Cup Holder It can be fixed on the handle of the stroller or next to the seat, so that parents can access it at any time 5-Point Safety Harness safety belt fixes the baby's body to the baby carriage seat, preventing the baby from sliding forward or backward due to inertia Peek-a-boo Window the design of the sky window allows parents to observe the baby's condition at any time
Shock Absorbing Spring can reduce the shock and impact that the baby receives during the movement of the baby stroller, so as to improve the baby's comfort and safety.
Strengthen Frame provides a range of benefits that make the stroller more convenient, durable, maneuverable, and safe for parents and their children
Compact Fold Design can be folded up easily when not in use, taking up less space and can easily be placed at home or in the trunk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, Sturdy, Smooth
reviews.reviewText: This baby stroller is a very "top of the line" stoller. There are so many options that make this so versatile.First, the construction, the main structure is aluminum tubing with an oval design. The connections and adjustment parts are a type of molded plastic that feels very solid. The rear wheels are 9 inch diameter and the front swivel wheels are 6 inch diameter. Both sets of wheels are mounted on molded frames that incorporate springs to act as shock absorbers. The wheels roll very easily and the back wheel have a foot controlled lever that locks the wheels in place. The front swivel wheels also have a manual switch that allows you to lock the swivel so that the front wheels stay straight.Second, The stroller came in a box and had two main pieces, the main assembly and the basket. Also the wheels were seperate inside the basket. The complete unit weighs around 23 pounds when put together. You need to install the wheels. (they snap in place and would be removeable if needed) Then you need to open the floded basket and attach it to the stroller body. It was fairly easy to assemble.Third, the basket can be used as a bassinet or there are straps and belts to fold it into a stroller seat including safety harness to strap the infant into. These changes can be done in a few minutes and is easier if you remove the basket from the stroller frame.Forth, the basket or seat can be reversedso that the infant is facing you. The basket comes with a retractable hood that is zippered in and a lower body cover that is also zippered in when you use it on windy or colder days. The basket has a cushion that covers the safety belts when used as a bassinet. The basket has a removeable bar that can be used to lift the seat or basket off of the stroller frame with two release points so you can carry the basket into the house with you.Fifth, with two clicks, the unit folds almost in half and there is a bar that allows you to carry the folded unit. This is a very well thought out design with lots of great ideas to make using a stroller safer and easier while riding in comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only reason this Stroller doesn’t get a 5 star is because the instructions are a little left to be desired.Other than that, the stroller is very durable and my Grandson loves getting pushed around in it. The compatibility is next level with this stroller. It has so many different functions and capabilities. I love the large storage space underneath. It makes a great place to keep the diaper back when going to the park. The fabric is very easy to clean and has yet to stain after cleaning up multiple messes on it. The canopy comes in handy on sunny days to keep the sun out of his eyes and off his skin. I would recommend purchasing this stroller and I can’t wait to use the other functions once he gets older.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Never going to use a different stroller for long outings again. This is not only beautifully put together, but it is perfect for long periods out of the house. Best way to avoid having your baby in a car seat for hours at a time. This stroller is easy to set up and comfortable for baby. I love this for vacations or fun outings with the kids. My baby can sleep comfortably and I can see her perfectly. The price is a bit high. But it really is worth every penny. It's easy to clean and easy to store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great infant stroller
reviews.reviewText: So far this stroller has been great. From first glance, it looks like many of the high end travel strollers and comes at half the price. The bassinet feature is great for those early months when the baby is sleeping all the time. You can just move this anywhere you need it, indoors and out, and have a safe place to sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars On the heavy side and not great for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: While this is a terrific stroller for a newborn, babies dont stay small for all that long. This was heavier than I expected when I lifted it into my trunk. It took up more space than I like, and it wont fit my toddler granddaughter very well. A great item for a new mom but I would like to see these grow with the child more over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easier to maneuver compared to our old Graco brand stroller
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a replacement stroller to our Graco one we had for 2 years. Our little one is 2 so am only reviewing for the stroller piece. Did not use or try the bassinet portion.As with any baby product, we knew assembly would be challenging. Since this isn't the first stoller we've put together, we were able to figure it out after a couple tries. This stroller is lighter and easier to move around than our old one. It's a little smaller as well and fits better in our car.I believe this would make a great gift for new parents as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but versatile stroller
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty pricey stroller, but it does work very well. It’s very versatile and has three different ways that it can be used depending on the age of your child. it is a bit hard to put together, and the instructions could definitely be more clear, but once you get the hang of it, it is a great stroller. It does fold flat, and it can easily be folded to put in a car, which makes it great when you’re on the go. This would be a great gift for new parents.
